title: 'I didn't think we were all together' - Shaw questions Man Utd attitude but praises 'phenomenal' Jones
description: BBC Sport's Simon Stone takes a closer look at a miserable night for Manchester United after a 1-0 defeat to Wolves.

title: David Bowie: Singer's estate sells rights to his entire body of work to WCM
description: Warner Chappell Music say they are "immensely proud" to be "chosen as caretakers".

title: Moutinho scores late winner as Man Utd lose at home to Wolves
description: Manchester United lose for the first time in the Premier League under interim coach Ralf Rangnick as Joao Moutinho scores a late winner for Wolverhampton Wanderers.

title: Pembrokeshire: Stranded starfish on Welsh beaches
description: Extreme weather and big tides are often the cause of sea life washing up on beaches say experts.

title: Prince Andrew accuser’s 2009 deal with Jeffrey Epstein made public
description: It shows Virginia Giuffre agreed not to sue anyone who could be described as a "potential defendant".

title: Stoke City 1-2 Preston North End: Lilywhites come from behind to beat Potters
description: Preston North End come from a goal down to beat Stoke City 2-1 in their first match in more than three weeks.

title: Late equaliser earns Derby dramatic draw at Reading
description: A 91st-minute equaliser from Curtis Davies sees Derby come from two goals down to draw at Reading.

title: Covid in Scotland: Cases hit record high of 20,000
description: The Scottish government says reporting results has been delayed due to the high volume of tests.

title: Covid: England must stick with Plan B to protect NHS - PM
description: PM says it would be "folly" to think pandemic is over - as hospitals face "considerable" pressure.

title: South Africa parliament fire flares up again
description: Firefighters are trying to douse the blaze which reignited hours after it was said to be under control.

title: 'You're constantly in pain - but I wouldn't change Christmas schedule'
description: MOTD2 pundit Jermaine Jenas says the hectic Christmas fixture list - part of English football history - can define your season.

title: Covid-19: French MPs get death threats over support for vaccine pass
description: They report the threats as they consider tougher restrictions on unvaccinated people in France.

title: Hospitals in Lincolnshire declare critical incident
description: Health bosses in Lincolnshire say there are "significant pressures" due to staff absences.

title: Richard Leakey - fossil expert, conservationist and politician
description: The achievements of Richard Leakey, who has died aged 77, were as remarkable as they were diverse.

title: Zaian Aimable-Lina: Teen charged with murder after 15-year-old stabbed
description: The boy, who cannot be named for legal reasons, will appear in court on Tuesday.

title: George Alagiah: Cancer will probably get me in the end
description: BBC newsreader George Alagiah says: "I don't think I'm going to be able to get rid of this thing."

title: Hungry goats recycle Christmas trees - and disrupt interviews
description: These goats at a London farm are part of an unusual way to recycle Christmas trees.

title: Israeli photographer captures unique bird spoon image
description: Wildlife photographer Albert Keshet said it was one of the most amazing pictures he had ever taken.

title: Lake District mountain rescuers plea after busiest-ever year
description: Lake District volunteers were called out to help people 680 times in 2021.

title: The Ashes: Joe Root says England can 'stand up in adversity'
description: Captain Joe Root says England have "a chance to come together" in the fourth Ashes Test against Australia starting on Wednesday.

title: Newborn baby found in toilet bin of Air Mauritius plane
description: The mother and baby are doing well, after airport staff found the boy during a routine check.

title: How Falklands War and rugby led to 40-year friendship
description: How Argentine prisoner of war and his Welsh guard struck an unlikely friendship on a mutinous ship.

title: NHS hospital uses robot technology
description: Southmead hospital in Bristol is using robots to help improve services.

title: The Papers: 'Backlash' at masks in schools and NHS staffing 'crisis'
description: Several front pages report on the impact of coronavirus on schools and staff shortages in the NHS.

title: Can fitness apps be as effective as a personal trainer?
description: A growing number of fitness apps use artificial intelligence software to personalise workouts.

title: Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 career statistics
description: Lewis Hamilton missed out on an eighth world title, but who is the greatest F1 driver? We have looked at some stats...

title: Sound Of 2022: Lola Young's slow-burning anthems are bubbling over
description: After recording the John Lewis Christmas song, Lola Young's smouldering songs are aimed at the top.

title: Games to look out for in 2022
description: The BBC's gaming reporter Steffan Powell runs through what to look out for over the coming year.

title: Kunal Kamra: The comedians under fire from Hindu nationalists
description: Kunal Kamra and Munawar Faruqui talk to the BBC about having shows cancelled in the face of right-wring ire.

title: Green Connect: The farm helping refugees build a life in Australia
description: It has employed 5,000 people in the past decade and "dramatically" changed fortunes, refugees say.
